conversion_verification.notes: The 2D floor plan was successfully transformed into a true 3D isometric cutaway model.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D geometry with clear wall thickness and volume; minor perspective compression on the far edge.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful reproduction of the architectural layout; room adjacencies and wall positions are near-perfect.

interior_elements.notes: All furniture, including the specific kitchen cabinetry, bathroom fixtures (corner tub), and bedroom layouts, match the source exactly.

visual_clarity.notes: Extremely clean rendering; geometry is highly readable with professional lighting and no UI contamination.

detected_errors.description: Minor door swing representation in 3D appears as thick extruded flaps compared to the 2D arcs.

summary: An exceptional 3D conversion that maintains high geometric fidelity and precisely replicates all interior elements from the original floor plan.
